description: Evidence-based treatments for foot health conditions, performed by certified podologists using sterile medical-grade instruments.

items.name: Comprehensive Foot Assessment
items.description: Full diagnostic evaluation including skin and nail condition analysis, biomechanical assessment, and personalized treatment plan.

items.name: Ingrown Nail Treatment
items.description: Professional correction of ingrown toenails using tamponade or brace technique, with follow-up care instructions.

items.name: Diabetic Foot Care
items.description: Specialized treatment protocol for diabetic patients, including gentle nail care, callus management, and vascular assessment.

items.name: Callus & Corn Removal
items.description: Safe removal of hardened skin and corns using professional podiatric instruments, with prevention guidance.

items.name: Fungal Nail Treatment
items.description: Targeted antifungal therapy including nail debridement, topical treatment application, and home care protocol.

description: Luxurious foot care treatments that combine medical precision with beauty and relaxation for naturally beautiful feet.

items.name: Medical Pedicure
items.description: Premium podological pedicure with nail shaping, cuticle care, callus treatment, and moisturizing foot mask.

items.name: Nail Reconstruction
items.description: Prosthetic nail application for damaged or missing nails using medical-grade gel, achieving a natural, beautiful appearance.

items.name: Luxury Foot Spa
items.description: Indulgent foot treatment with aromatic soak, exfoliation, paraffin wrap, and relaxing massage for ultimate rejuvenation.

items.name: Cracked Heel Repair
items.description: Intensive treatment for dry, cracked heels including mechanical debridement, deep hydration, and protective sealing.

description: Custom orthotic solutions and gait analysis to address structural imbalances and improve overall foot function.

items.name: Gait Analysis
items.description: Comprehensive walking pattern assessment using pressure mapping technology to identify biomechanical issues.

items.name: Custom Orthotic Insoles
items.description: Individually crafted orthotic insoles based on 3D foot scanning, designed to correct alignment and relieve pressure points.

items.name: Orthonyxie (Nail Bracing)
items.description: Application of corrective nail braces to reshape curved or involuted nails without surgery.
